title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Kaske on Puerto Rico’s Debt (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Kaske on Puerto Rico’s Debt (Audio)
description:
Michelle Kaske, Bloomberg News reporter, discusses Puerto Rico filing for protection from creditors, and seeking relief for over 70 billion dollars in debt. She speaks with Greg Stohr and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
